dsvizopts 0.0.0.9000

  • Changelog

Theme options

dsvizopts_theme.Rd

Arguments

logo

Logo path or url
logo_position

Logo "left" or "right"
palette_colors

Vector of colors
palette_colors_categorical

Vector of colors suitable for categorical variable
palette_colors_sequential

Vector of sequential colors suitable for numerical variable
palette_colors_divergent

Vector of divergent colors suitable for numerical variable
palette_type

Type of color palette "categorical", "sequential", or "divergent"
branding_include

Include branding logical
branding_text

Text for branding bar
background_color

Plot background color
branding_background_color

Branding bar background color
accent_color

?
text_show

?
text_size

Size of text in pt
text_color

Text color
text_family

Font
line_color

Axis and grid line colors
line_size

Line size
title_color

Color for title text
title_align

Alignment of title "left", "center" or "right"
title_family

Title font
title_size

Title size, defaults to 1.1 text_size
title_weight

Font weight for title
subtitle_color

Color for subtitle text
subtitle_align

Alignment of subtitle "left", "center" or "right"
subtitle_size

Subtitle size, defaults to 1.1 text_size
subtitle_weight

Font weight for subtitle
caption_color

Color for caption text
caption_align

Alignment of caption "left", "center" or "right"
caption_size

caption size, defaults to 1.1 text_size
axis_title_color

Color for axis text
axis_title_size

Axis text size
axis_line_color

Axis line color
axis_line_size

Axis line width
axis_ticks_color

Axis ticks color
axis_tick_length

Axis tick length
grid_x_enabled

Enable horizontal grid
grid_x_color

Horizontal grid color
grid_x_size

Horizontal grid line width
grid_y_enabled

Enable vertical grid
grid_y_color

Vertical grid color
grid_y_size

Verical grid line width
grid_y_dash

?
plot_margin_bottom

Plot margin bottom
plot_margin_top

Plot margin top
plot_margin_left

Plot margin left
plot_margin_right

Plot margin right
plot_background_color

? Chart background color
plot_border_color

? Chart border color
plot_border_size

? Chart border width
label_color

? Text color
label_size

? Text size
label_text_decoration

? Text decoration
label_text_outline

? Text outline
